tilsdk.mock_robomaster.chassis

Module Contents

Classes

Chassis

class tilsdk.mock_robomaster.chassis.Chassis(robot)
drive_speed(x=0.0, y=0.0, z=0.0, timeout=0)

Command robot to drive at given velocity.

Parameters:

  • x (float) – Forward velocity in m/s.

  • y (float) – Rightwards velocity in m/s.

  • z (float) – Clockwise angular velocity in deg/s.
